name: Nando Boom
description:
'''Nando Boom''' is a [[reggae en Espa침ol]] artist from Panam치 led by Fernando Brown.

Brown began singing in 1977, and "Nando Boom" started in 1985. Nando Boom's new and speedy music style has influenced heavily the evolution of Latin music over the past few years as one of the fathers of reggae en Espa침ol. 
His ''vm grinding'' dance moves have also changed the way people dance since the mid-1990s. This backwards dancing style is now the representative dancing of reggaeton listeners.
His most popular songs are "A Danzar" and "Esa Chica Me Vacila", still one of the main songs played in nightclubs all over Latin America.

For many fans and critics he is considered to be a pioneer of [[reggaeton]] and one of the most important figures in reggae en Espa침ol.

The band received the Caracol of the Caribbean award from Colombia in 1992 and a Stefano award in Miami in 1994.

Nando Boom has released songs with homophobic lyrics, such as the song "No queremos mariflor". He was then criticized by the [[LGBT rights in Panama|gay community of Panama]].
